sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
persuades someone to do a particular thing
, z dobrim razlogom nekoga spodbudi, da nekaj naredi.

seg.quote: Marsha was trying to persuade Posy to change her mind.
...as the threat of unemployment persuades workers to moderate their pay demands.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
persuades someone that something is true
, govori stvari, zaradi katerih na koncu tista oseba verjame, da je res tako.

seg.quote: We worked hard to persuade them that we were genuinely interested.
Persuade him of your seriousness about this.
Few of them are persuaded of the benefits of the shop.
